definition: Tujia ethnic group of Hunan

earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)

sentences.english: The flesh-patting dance (Rou Lianxiang) in West part of Hubei is closely related to Buddhism.
sentences.chinese: 鄂西土家族民间舞蹈肉连响与佛教关系密切。

sentences.english: Fenghuang is a habitat area of Chinese minorities, ethnic Miao and Tujia.
sentences.chinese: 凤凰是土家族和苗族的居住区。

sentences.english: I had heard about the Tujia before, but new next to nothing about them.
sentences.chinese: 我先前听说过土家族，但对他们几乎一无所知。

sentences.english: Tujia ethnic group in Hubei mainly lives in the compact communities of Wuling mountain area.
sentences.chinese: 湖北土家族长期聚居在鄂西武陵山区。

sentences.english: Song of Tima is a glorious epic of Tujia.
sentences.chinese: 《梯玛神歌》是一部辉煌的土家族历史史诗。

sentences.english: Tima has played an important role in the history of Tujia society.
sentences.chinese: 梯玛在土家族社会历史中具有重要作用。

sentences.english: Phoenix city since ancient times has been the areas inhabited by the Miao and Tujia.
sentences.chinese: 凤凰古城自古以来就一直是苗族和土家族的聚居地区。

sentences.english: The funerals in the regions of Tujia Nationality are often accompanied with drum music and dance.
sentences.chinese: 土家族地区的丧葬习俗，常和鼓乐同在，与歌舞同存。

sentences.english: In 1984, approved by the State Council, a local government was finally established.
sentences.chinese: 1984年，经国务院批准设立长阳土家族自治县。

sentences.english: Chinese culture is brilliant, and Tujia Minority Medicine is also in long history.
sentences.chinese: 汉文化灿烂辉煌，土家族医药渊源流长。
